actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Joint resolution relating to the regulation by the States of certain Indian hunting and fishing rights.

summary.text: Allows the States to enact laws regulating off-reservation hunting and fishing granted to Indians by treaty if the laws are (1) purely regulatory concerning the time and manner of hunting and fishing outside an Indian reservation, and (2) equally applicable to Indians and all other citizens.

titles.title: Joint resolution relating to the regulation by the States of certain Indian hunting and fishing rights.
